summary: Build a fully interactive single-page birthday website for Sailvi (HTML/CSS/JS) with a tap-to-start intro, premium animated pink background, multi-slide experience (countdown, title, photo popups, two videos, shayari split screen, final surprise, fireworks), and strict media/asset rules for reliable in-browser playback.
architectural_notes: Single-page HTML/CSS/JS template with slide/state controller; start screen gates all media playback.
No audio playback before user tap; birthday.mp3 starts only after countdown completion.
During video slides, pause background music; resume after video ends (unless otherwise specified).
All assets must be referenced from root with exact filenames; no subfolders and no relative paths beyond filename.
Video behavior requirements: no autoplay, no crop (preserve aspect ratio), landscape-friendly layout.
Layout rules: several screens must be full-screen with no scroll (especially shayari and final message).
